metadata.title: CVE-2021-47064 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:mt76: fix potential DMA mapping leakWith buf uninitialized in mt76_dma_tx_queue_skb_raw, its field skip_unmapcould potentially inherit a non-zero value from stack garbage.If this happens, it will cause DMA mappings for MCU command frames to notbeunmapped after completion

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
